bug.short_desc: Firefox in Bugzilla maintenance: Add version 3.6 and remove versions 3.1 and 3.2

long_desc.thetext:
Clearly, the changes in Firefox versioning are to be reflected in qooxdoo's bug tracking system. Of course, it's not a smooth transition from a 3.1b3 to a 3.5b4.
Well, what has recently been started by adding FF3.5 to qooxdoo's bugzilla has been finished now (thanks to Helder for helping to resolve this issue): all bugs that where previously assigned to FF3.1 are now on FF3.5. BTW, FF3.5b4 is due next week. FF3.2 is now replaced by FF3.6, but I guess once it is being released in 2010 it won't go by that name.
Closed all bugs already shipped with a release.
